動物用藥品名稱: 有泉俄羅斯口蹄疫不活化疫苗(O MANISA株)
英文名稱: INACTIVATED MONOVALENT EMULSION FOOT-AND-MOUTH DISEASE VACCINE TYPE O MANISA FOR PIGS AND PUMINANTS
製造廠名稱: FEDERAL GOVERNMENTAL BUDGETARY INSTITUTION "FEDERAL CENTRE FOR ANIMAL HEALTH"(FGBI "ARRIAH")
效能(適應症): 預防豬及反芻獸口蹄疫感染。
ingredients: ANTIGEN: INACTIVATED FMD VIRUS O MANISA GROWN IN BHK 21 CELLCULTURE. EACH DOSE (2ML) OF THE VACCINE CONTAINS 6 OR MORE PD50VALENCY. OIL ADJUVANT: 1ML PER DOSE.
